item.title: NEM
item.description: score:86 Chances: Gold producers are raising bets on copper through deals and investments to gain influence over the commodity vital to the global energy transition. NEM concluded the recent trading session with a slight decrease in stock price. Newmont Corporation settled previously announced offers to exchange for new 3.
